title: Who is the ugliest female K-pop idol? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ugliest huh…oh well I have seen one girl. And did you know that she is almost in every single kpop girl group I love?! You don't believe me? Well let me show you some photos of her. #1 In Blackpink!  Can you see how ugly she is?! Smh…. #2 In Twice!  OMG my eyes!!! How can someone be Soo ugly!!! #3 In Red velvet!  All those pretty girls…and then you see her. Ugh… #4 In Dreamcatcher!  I…I don't have anything to say.. Can you believe it?! She is so ugly that she is almost an InViSibLe member! It's just her visuals are not a cup of my tea. You get me? It's JuSt My oPinIon alriGht? DOnt hAte oN Me ! Thanks for reading 😃 (Excuse my awful drawing. It's currently night time and I am too lazy to draw a PiTch PeRfeCt ouTline )

Here's a list of male and female (mostly male) idols I USED to that were unattractive. I've only used the word ugly for one(which they did not deserve) Jhope(BTS)  Yes i don't think he's unattractive anymore but I wouldn't say hes the most attractive. he's still very good looking just not my usual ‘type ‘ of good looking ya know? JB (Got7)  Bruhhh him with long hair is h o t😤 I love. But I thought he was unattractive when he had a mullet, I don't like mullets most of the time😳mostly just on kpop idols- Jiyoon (Weeekly)  she's my bias and she's beautiful bUt at first I thought she wasn't very pretty and I don't even know why💁 Jisung(nct)  Ok I only thought he was unattractive when he was 14. But I started to stan when he was 16 so um I never really thought he was unattractive in the moment so idk if he counts. Here are idols I never thought were unattractive but used to think they were less good looking(many of these) Johnny (nct)  Rejun(nct)  Chenle (NCT)  Jisung (straykids)  Woojin (ex straykids member😔)  Changbin(stray kids)  Jisoo(blackpink)  Ok I never really underestimated it I just thought rosé was better looking and now I think jisoo is the best looking😳 Yugyeom (got7)  Yuna (itzy)  Seulgi(red velevet)
